comment: /** * Create and return a new {@link QuantityFeature} from the error probabilities of the specified * FASTQ formatted sequence. The error probabilities feature has a type "errorProbabilities" * and will be the same length as the sequence. * * @param fastq FASTQ formatted sequence, must not be null * @return a new {@link QualityFeature} from the error probabilities of the specified FASTQ * formatted sequence */
